thread.title: 34 Times The "This Is Us" Cast Was The Absolute Cutest
thread.title_full: 34 Times The "This Is Us" Cast Was The Absolute Cutest

author: Krystie Lee Yandoli
title: 34 Times The "This Is Us" Cast Was The Absolute Cutest
text:
View this image ›
Sterling Brown / Via instagram.com ID: 10295484 2. And the actors get along pretty well in real life, too. View this image ›
Mandy Moore / Via instagram.com ID: 10295523 3. Milo Ventimiglia (Jack Pearson), Mandy Moore (Rebecca Pearson), Sterling Brown (Randall Pearson), Chrissy Metz (Kate Pearson), and Justin Hartley (Kevin Pearson)’s real-life relationships are just as adorable as their characters’ are on the show. View this image ›
Chrissy Metz / Via instagram.com And we can’t leave out Chris Sullivan (Toby)!
ID: 10295468 4. They attend fancy events together. View this image ›
Mandy Moore / Via instagram.com ID: 10295495 5. They laugh with each other in between takes. View this image ›
Justin Hartley / Via instagram.com ID: 10295487 6. And have plenty of fun behind the scenes. View this image ›
Mandy Moore / Via instagram.com ID: 10295517 7. Moore and Ventimiglia playing a fictional couple and being IRL friends is truly a gift to the world. View this image ›
Mandy Moore / Via instagram.com ID: 10295530 8. They look s good together. View this image ›
Mandy Moore / Via instagram.com ID: 10295537 9. Not to mention, they seem to have a pretty fun time when they’re together off set. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @mandymooremm ID: 10295534 10. We are not worthy. View this image ›
Mandy Moore / Via instagram.com ID: 10295528 11. View this image ›
Mandy Moore / Via instagram.com ID: 10295520 12. Ventimiglia and Metz are clearly the best fictional father/daughter duo ever. View this image ›
Milo Ventimiglia / Via Twitter: @MiloVentimiglia ID: 10295566 (Lol.) View this image ›
Milo Ventimiglia / Via Twitter: @MiloVentimiglia ID: 10295569 13. The only duo that maybe rivals them is Moore and Metz, because who doesn’t love all the dancing that goes on between the Pearsons? Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @mandymooremm ID: 10295510 14. So. Much. Dancing. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @mandymooremm ID: 10295540 15. There’s plenty of father-son love to go around with Ventimiglia and Hartley… View this image ›
Milo Ventimiglia / Via Twitter: @MiloVentimiglia ID: 10295572 16. And with Ventimiglia and Brown. The Pearson patriarch did a bunch of push-ups with his TV son on his back, imitating an episode of This Is Us . I got you @sterlingkb1. Always brother. #ThisIsUs. MV
— Milo Ventimiglia (@MiloVentimiglia) ID: 10295553 17. And then Brown did push-ups with Ventimiglia on HIS back… ...And I got you pop, @MiloVentimiglia! #ThisIsUs...
— Sterling K Brown (@sterlingkb1) ID: 10299125 18. …and when Brown did push ups with Hartley on his back… .@MiloVentimiglia and I got @JustinHartley too. He ain't heavy, he's my brother. #ThisIsUs
— Sterling K Brown (@sterlingkb1) ID: 10299132 19. …And when Hartley brought everything full circle and did push-ups with Brown on his back. .@MiloVentimiglia Right back atcha @Sterlingkb1! #ThisIsUs"
— Justin Hartley (@justinhartley) ID: 10299166 20. Not only are Ventimiglia and Moore close to their adult children on the show… View this image ›
Mandy Moore / Via instagram.com ID: 10295513 21. …but they also post adorable photos of themselves alongside the actors who play the young Pearson children, too! View this image ›
Mandy Moore / Via instagram.com ID: 10295505 22. They even take plenty of selfies when they’re together on set. View this image ›
Mandy Moore / Via instagram.com Lonnie Chavis plays young Randall, Mackenzie Hancsicsak plays young Kate, Parker Bates plays young Kevin, Niles Fitch plays teenage Randall, Hannah Zeile plays teenage Kate, and Logan Shroyer plays teenage Kevin.
ID: 10295500 (Thankfully, they even post the selfies for us to enjoy.) View this image ›
Milo Ventimiglia / Via Twitter: @MiloVentimiglia ID: 10295552 23. IT’S HONESTLY TOO MUCH. View this image ›
Mandy Moore / Via instagram.com ID: 10295522 24. Brown posing next to Chavis is equally precious. View this image ›
Sterling Brown / Via instagram.com ID: 10295474 25. These fictional siblings are clearly super photogenic. View this image ›
Justin Hartley / Via instagram.com ID: 10295486 26. Brother selfie! View this image ›
Sterling Brown / Via instagram.com ID: 10295476 27. Also, KATE AND TOBY FOREVER. View this image ›
Chrissy Metz / Via instagram.com ID: 10295467 28. Brown and his TV wife Susan Kelechi Watson (Beth Pearson) are really something else. View this image ›
Susan Kelechi Watson / Via Twitter: @skelechiwatson ID: 10295584 29. And look at them with their adorable TV daughters, Eris Baker (Tess Pearson) and Faithe Herman (Annie Pearson). View this image ›
Sterling Brown / Via Twitter: @sterlingkb1 ID: 10299107 30. ICONIC. View this image ›
Susan Kelechi Watson / Via Twitter: @skelechiwatson ID: 10295595 31. Families who text together, stay together. View this image ›
Milo Ventimiglia / Via Twitter: @MiloVentimiglia ID: 10295565 32. Thank you, Pearsons, for being the best family on TV… View this image ›
Susan Kelechi Watson / Via Twitter: @skelechiwatson ID: 10295585 33. …and the cutest friends IRL, too! View this image ›
Sterling Brown / Via Twitter: @sterlingkb1 ID: 10299005 34. View this image ›
Milo Ventimiglia / Via Twitter: @MiloVentimiglia ID: 10295563
